sentences.en: As they report online this week in Nature Geoscience, the model shows that the Bering Strait's status was directly responsible for the ice-sheet oscillations.
sentences.cn: 他们在本周《自然-地球科学》杂志在线版上报道：模拟显示，白令海峡的状况是造成冰盖振荡的直接原因。

sentences.en: Eurasia comprises the whole of the northern part Asiatic land - mass , from Portugal to the Bering Strait.
sentences.cn: 欧亚国占欧亚大陆的整个北部, 从葡萄牙到白令海峡.

sentences.en: I count myself in nothing else so happy as in a soul remem - bering my good friends.
sentences.cn: 我认为,只有在脑海中想起好朋友时我才会那样快乐.

sentences.en: I first came to North American in prehistoric times when I crossed the Bering Strait land bridge from Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 在史前时期，我从欧亚大陆穿越白令海峡、走过陆地、桥第一次来到了北美。

sentences.en: It was travelling north on its annual migration to the rookeries of Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 现在正当一年一度向北迁徒到白令海的老窝去的季节.

sentences.en: Its modern distribution suggests that Japanese sailors were the first people to reach the Americas, millennia before Siberians wandered across the Bering Strait.
sentences.cn: 其现代分布表明，日本船员首先到达美洲，比西伯利亚人越过白令海峡早了一千年。

sentences.en: Lowered sea levels exposed the shallow continental shelf beneath the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 海平面下降使白令海底部的浅层大陆架暴露出来。

sentences.en: Scientists believe such hunters followed animals east across what is now the Bering Sea.
sentences.cn: 科学家相信这样的猎人跟著这些动物东渡现在的白令海.

sentences.en: The crew, believing that their vessel was about to capsize, abandoned ship in the Bering sea.
sentences.cn: 船员们感到这艘船即将倾覆, 消逝在白令海.

sentences.en: The storms that routinely batter ships on the Bering Sea are legendary.
sentences.cn: 在白令海上不时有将船只砸个粉碎的暴风雨出现,传为奇谈.

sentences.en: Water from the Bering Sea crashes on the rocks of Margaret Bay in Dutch Harbor, Alaska.
sentences.cn: 白令海的海水, 撞击着阿拉斯加州荷兰港玛格丽特湾的岩石.

trans.tran_cn: 白令(Vitus, 1680-1741，丹麦航海家，白令海及白令海峡的发现者)
